TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 94
TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Stephen F Austin, 08-21828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 21, 1828. Expects to leave shortly for Saltillo and asks what he can do for the colony. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 94

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ramon Musquiz to Austin, August 21, 1828. Expects to leave shortly for Saltillo and asks what he can do for the colony. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*,*date_mentioned n="08-21-1828"> August 21, 1828*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar*/p*
*/div1*
